name: Civius_Bain
content:
Civius Bain was a male Rodian ryll smuggler who lived on Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was the son of Olivia Bain.
Civius Bain resided on Corellia with his mother Olivia Bain and his fater, an accountant. After the Battle of Yavin, the young man got indebted to the spice smugglers Jaryn Minoze and Oret Sturm, two members of the ryll smuggling ring of the Chirq Council in Kor Vella. Civius Bain was forced to work for the smugglers in the Ryll Smuggler Base where they refined their ryll. His mother was desperate and wished for him to leave the smuggling ring and come home.
In 1 ABY, Olivia Bain met a spacer in the Vella plains and begged to rescue her son. The spacer accepted and headed to the Ryll Smuggler Base. The spacer found Civius Bain in the bunker but the young man explained that he could not leave the smuggling ring since he was still indebted to the smugglers. The spacer therefore killed both Jaryn Minoze and Oret Sturm, allowing Civius to finally escape. After that, Civius Bain decided to start a new life and become an accountant like his father.
Civius Bain was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Civius Bain was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
